pjvovkgmailcom Sr Inventory Manager Kroger Personal Finance JV Cincinnati OH December 2009 to July 2015 Responsible for the production and distribution of gift card consumer products throughout the Kroger family of stores Insured five warehouses and 2500 stores were in stock to support 3B in annual sales Managed and negotiated with third party vendors to produce and deliver the optimal product Developed endtoend testing among three vendors from the POS to backend settlement eliminating risk Identified 333000 in erroneous billings from vendor through diligent review of invoices resulting in
